data.env:
SECRET_KEY_BASE=576539402188ebb43de8ecde867031ac
FRONTEND_URL=https://$(PRIMARY_DOMAIN)
DEFAULT_LOCALE=en
FORCE_SSL=false
ENABLE_ACCOUNT_SIGNUP=true
REDIS_URL=redis://default:27e740b686971f63bb8fcec45e264f3b@$(PROJECT_NAME)_redis:6379
REDIS_PASSWORD=27e740b686971f63bb8fcec45e264f3b
REDIS_OPENSSL_VERIFY_MODE=none
POSTGRES_DATABASE=chatwoot
POSTGRES_HOST=$(PROJECT_NAME)_postgres
POSTGRES_USERNAME=postgres
POSTGRES_PASSWORD=6dd0803691e3b54643092a0fdfd59f81
RAILS_MAX_THREADS=5
NODE_ENV=production
RAILS_ENV=production
INSTALLATION_ENV=docker
TRUSTED_PROXIES=*

deploy.command: bundle exec rails db:chatwoot_prepare && bundle exec rails s -p 3000 -b 0.0.0.0
